import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Task } from '../../models/Task'; import { Time } from "@angular/common"; @Component({ selector: 'app-body', templateUrl: './body.component.html', styleUrls: ['./body.component.css'] }) export class BodyComponent implements OnInit { tasks!:Task[]; constructor() { } ngOnInit(): void { this.tasks = [ { content: 'first', // date: Date, // time: Time, completed: false }, { content: 'second', completed: true } ] } }
